summary: This bill, H.R. 499, proposes to rename the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) medical center in Dallas, Texas, as the "Eddie Bernice Johnson VA Medical Center." The legislation honors Congresswoman Eddie Bernice Johnson for her contributions to veterans, citing her 16 years as Chief Psychiatric Nurse at the same facility and her 30-year congressional career advocating for veterans' issues. The bill officially redesignates the medical center located at 4500 South Lancaster Road, ensuring all future official references use the new name to commemorate her legacy and service.
